column1: '''Thomas Kane Roberts''' (1962) is an American voice actor. He has voiced a wide variety of recognizable characters in cartoons, including Professor Utonium of ''The Powerpuff Girls'', Monkey Fist in ''Kim Possible'', Darwin in ''The Wild Thornberries'' and Mr. Herriman in ''Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends''. He also provides the voices for Yoda and [[Anthony Daniels
column2: C-3PO]] whenever their actors are not available.
